ModMetaData.name: Pinata
ModMetaData.author: Bowab, Angelica
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds a Pinata that produces a random item when milked.
Update 1.1 - Toggle what items might be gathered in modsettings.
Q: Compatibile with A Dog Said? A: Yes. You need A Dog Said and LBE's A Dog Said Easy Patcher loaded before this mod.
Artwork by Angelica.
